title: I keep getting this ''Could not connect to the HTTP server. Please check that your internet connecti
body: I keep getting this ''Could not connect to the HTTP server. Please check that your internet connection is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking access.'

replies.body:
There are network operations in progress and you are surely not the only one who's getting the annoying RADS error

Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\system

Open the system.cfg file with notepad and copy paste one of the following lines depending on what region you have :

DownloadPath = /releases/live
DownloadURL = l3cdn.riotgames.com
Region = NA

DownloadPath = /releases/live
DownloadURL = l3cdn.riotgames.com
Region = EUW

DownloadPath = /releases/live
DownloadURL = l3cdn.riotgames.com
Region = EUNE

save the file and try to re-open your launcher. it should now start patching

Hopefully this works for you
Didn't work for me... Any other options?

> [{quoted}](name=Mister Plumbum,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Lzhz1qVl,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-05-16T17:27:48.347+0000)
>
> Didn't work for me... Any other options?

Go to Network and Sharing center > Change Adapter Settings > Open your connection by double left click > Properties > IPv4 > Properties 

change DNS to :

8 8 4 4 
8 8 8 8 

Maybe that works for you. 

Best of luck
We're aware of this issue and are working to resolve it. :)
Look at the top of the page.
delete everything in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions
